ygData.subject: Re: Out of the Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: Wildrider looks at Shockwave in shock, and begins to laugh. Imposter, what are you talking about he says between cackles. Seriously though, if I show back

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Wildrider looks at Shockwave in shock, and begins to laugh. "Imposter,
what are you talking about" he says between cackles. "Seriously though,
if I show back up without you, Megatron will melt me down as well." He
said, his tone changing to show how serious he was.
